neutral.human.male.traveler.villager.mal: Ah, hello there Human. I never thought I would see one of your kind.
Your kind was a powerful race. Yet their crave for power was their downfall.
Do not repeat your ancestor's mistakes, Human.
neutral.human.male.traveler.villager.fem: Oh my! You must be a Human!
I wish you great fortune in your life, Human. And I know you will find your way.
My, you truly are a special person. You came from another world, after all!
neutral.human.male.traveler.baby.male: Wow! I've never seen a Human before! Tell me! What are your powers?
I heard the Humans come from a whole different world! Is that true?
neutral.human.male.traveler.baby.female: How did you come here? You must be very strong...
...Did you want to be friends? Pretty please?
neutral.human.female.traveler.villager.m: Ah, hello there Human. I never thought I would see one of your kind.

neutral.human.female.traveler.baby.femal: How did you come here? You must be very strong...

neutral.fairie.male.traveler.villager.ma: You should become a fighter. You would be gifted at it.
I wish you great fortune in your life, brother.
neutral.fairie.male.traveler.villager.fe: Are you a fighter? You must be, right? You are strong yet nimble.
Your strength will bring you great success. I see it in you already.
neutral.fairie.male.traveler.baby.male: Hello there! How are you Sir?
Wow, you're strong. Can we be friends?
Wanna play with me? Let's see who can fly the furthest!
neutral.fairie.male.traveler.baby.female: Do you think we can be friends? I want to hear stories about your travels...
...Have you seen any Whisps on your journey? I've always wanted one as a pet.
You seem quick and nimble. Ever look into the fighting arts?
I wish you great fortune on your journey, sister.
Are you a fighter? You must be, right? you are small and nimble.
Your power will bring you great success, sister.

neutral.roseian.male.traveler.villager.m: Things have been very interesting for you, I can see.
Do not underestimate your powers, Roseian. It will shadow over your potential.
neutral.roseian.male.traveler.villager.f: I wish you great fortune on your journey, Roseian!
We welcome any who are allies to magic. Come to us if you need anything.
neutral.roseian.male.traveler.baby.male: Hello there Roseian! How are you?
Wow, you're rather strong for your people.
Can we be friends? Please? I will tell you your future!

...I've always wanted a Crystling as a pet. They are very cute.

neutral.oni.male.traveler.villager.male: Aggression can erase the fulfilling potential of your future. Remember that.
Whatever your intentions are, I wish you luck and kindness in your life.
neutral.oni.male.traveler.villager.femal: Oh, you must be an Oni.
Are you a traveler? you must be, right?
You don't seem aggressive. Just let this be a warning to not cause trouble.
neutral.oni.male.traveler.baby.male: You smell like campfire and dirt. You are an Oni, alright.
Sorry, but I don't think we can play together. You'd snap me in half...
neutral.oni.male.traveler.baby.female: ...Um...You're very tall and intimidating.... should I be scared?
...If you are a gentle giant, we can be friends...

...Um...May I ask why your Onis don't like others in The Deepwoods?

Your travels have been interesting for you, hasn't it Emberian?
Ego and Pride can trap you. It has for your race. Beware of falling into that trap.
Be careful wandering into Glaceia without Topaz. The cold there is deadly for your race.
I wish you great fortune on your journey, Emberian!
neutral.emberian.male.traveler.baby.male: Ow! Your skin burns! Are you really made of fire?
Can we be friends? You are so cool! Or lit, as you would say...
neutral.emberian.male.traveler.baby.fema: I'm sorry, I don't think I can be near you. It's like touching a lit candle.
Do you feel lonely? I would if I was fire. I'll still be your friend!

neutral.iceian.male.traveler.villager.fe: Be careful wandering into Emberia without Sapphire. The heat there is deadly for your race.
I wish you great fortune on your journey, Iceian!
neutral.iceian.male.traveler.baby.male: Yikes! Your skin is freezing! Are you really made of ice?
Did you wanna play? I can show you some of my magic tricks!
neutral.iceian.male.traveler.baby.female: Wow! You look like a living ice sculpture! Um...! I'm sorry if that was offensive...
Um...We can be friends if you want. I just don't like the cold. We'd have to keep a distance.
